name: Dream Home: Design & Makeover
description:
Did you ever dream to design and decorate your own house, your sweet home exactly how you want? Now you can design houses with Dream Home – Design & Makeover Game! Show us your talent for home decor! Come design and makeover your dream houses and have fun with puzzles at the same time!

Become a home makeover and interior designer and solve fun match-2 puzzles to win a wide variety of fabulous rewards! Passing the matching levels to renovate all kinds of rooms and house plans!

Ready to decorate your dream home? Download Dream Home: Design & Makeover, and start to Play Now!

*** With Dream Home game you will have much fun ***

-Home Design: Various styles to discover! Design houses and rooms in your style, all by yourself!

-Simple Gameplay: Match at least 2 cubes of the same color, blast the blockers to collect decorations, boosters, and other props at each level!

-1000+ match 2 levels: Constantly updated addictive puzzle gameplay. 1000 plus challenging match-2 levels with awesome boosters.

- Unlimited Rooms: Constantly updated rooms and houses.

-Various Design Styles: Most popular interior design styles for recent 10 years at your disposal! Choose your favorite furniture and decoration, design your dream home, renovate rooms in your taste!

-Different Rooms: Living room, bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, nursery, terrace, cozy corner, study room, etc. All in your choice!

-Multiple Houses: Not satisfied with only one house? We have plenty of houses for you to design and makeover!

Challenge the match 2 puzzle levels and show your design talent Now!


*** Game Features ***
-Various decorations & furniture to collect
-Show off your design skill by joining various exciting tournaments!
-Over 1000 challenging puzzles in this decoration design & toon world!
-Addictive gameplay.

Start your happiness by joining our Dream Home – Home Design game!
Let’s have fun in the house design world！
Download now to enjoy renovation & creation with your friends!

Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have any questions or problems with Dream Home.
